description: The tender is to acquire six items for the CC138 twin otter for the Department of National Defense. This is a competitive bid for qualified supply arrangement holders.
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for CC138 Twin Otter

#### Solicitation Number: W8485-247848/A
#### Tender Closing Date: October 24th, 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence's Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) is seeking to acquire **six (6) items** for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to **pre-qualified supply arrangement holders**. The nine (9) companies listed in the official documentation have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
* Bristow
* Genaire Limited
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* M1 Composites Technology
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* Rockwell Collins Canada

**Prospective Bidders**

The RFP documents will be electronically distributed directly to the qualified supply arrangement holders. **Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of RFP documents**.

**Contact Information**

For inquiries related to this RFP, please contact:

*Brendan Vick*, Contracting Authority, 
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada, 
455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7,
(brendan.vick2@forces.gc.ca, +1 819-939-4277)

**Trade Agreement and Procurement Category**

This solicitation is subject to the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**. The procurement category is classified under **Goods and Services for Defence (GD)**.

**Interested Suppliers**

A Notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified should contact:

*Edmond Egikian*, Supply Officer, 
Public Services and Procurement Canada, 
(edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: The RFP deadline has expired. However, suppliers are encouraged to submit their expressions of interest to the Department of National Defence's DAP for potential future opportunities.  That's the exact wording that the contractor has provided. Hope I was able to rewrite it better than this text
